Text: I am a doctor. I do not speak your language. I will communicate with you using this website. Answer me in English as much as possible. Thank you.

Text: Please give me your Work Permit

Text: In the last 14 days, did you meet anyone who has coronavirus?

Text: Who? What is your relationship with them?
Translation: Siapa namanya? Apa hubungan anda dengan orang tersebut?

Text: How many days ago did you meet them?
Translation: Berapa hari lalu anda bertemu dengan orang tersebut?

Text:
